name: AVContentAuthorizationStatus
desc: A value representing the status of a content authorization request.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The content authorization content request hasn't completed.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The last completed call to request content authorization completed.

items.name: case cancelled
items.desc: The last call to request content authorization was cancelled by the user.

items.name: case timedOut
items.desc: The last call to request content authorization was cancelled because the timeout interval was reached.

items.name: case busy
items.desc: The last call to request content authorization couldn't be completed because another asset is currently attempting authorization.

items.name: case notAvailable
items.desc: The last call to request content authorization couldn't be completed because there was no known mechanism by which to attempt authorization.

items.name: case notPossible
items.desc: The last call to request content authorization couldn't be completed in a non-recoverable way.
